name: Neon (itch) (GuilhermeGSousa)
description:
Neon is a platformer prototype where you use neon ropes to swing your way through platforms and puzzles!

This is just a prototype for now, but if you like this concept and would like to see more please let me know and consider supporting this demo!

Follow me on Twitter for more update on this demo @CodfishCode

Thanks for playing!

PS: Think my game could be better and are interested in doing art or game design for this project? Send me a message! If enough people are interested in following developpement
